name: Reactor Countdown
description:
Welcome to Reactor Countdown! This game was made in 7 days for the Time Jam (8 Bits to Infinity). Someone has started the self-destruct sequence in the power plant and you are sent in to turn off the reactor. The scientists are equipped with devices to extend the countdown, and you need to extend it at all costs.

WASD or arrow keys to move

Shift to sprint

Left Click to shoot

All assets were made by me.
